Built for work, learning, and accessibility

Texter is more than a recorder—it’s a quiet assistant that helps you stay present while everything is captured for later.

  • Meeting notes: Record → transcribe → summarize in one flow.
  • OCR: Turn photos and PDFs into editable text.
  • Video transcripts: Make lectures and interviews searchable.
  • Translation: Switch languages for global teams.
  • Summaries: Share key takeaways fast.
  • Subtitles: Auto-caption videos and tweak the timing.

FAQ

Quick answers to get you started.

What can Texter do?
Transcribe audio, extract text with OCR, transcribe videos, translate, summarize, and generate subtitles—all in one app.
Can I edit the transcript?
Yes. You can edit the generated text and reuse it in notes, documents, or posts.
Can it generate subtitles from a video?
Yes. Import a video to generate timestamped captions, then fine-tune sentence by sentence.
Is there a free plan?
Yes. The Free plan lets you try core features. For longer and more advanced usage, Premium is available.
